name: A. The Monster
statement:
A monster is chasing after Rick and Morty on another planet. They’re so
frightened that sometimes they scream. More accurately, Rick screams at
times and Morty screams at times . The Monster will catch them if at any
point they scream at the same time, so it wants to know when it will
catch them (the first time they scream at the same time) or that they
will never scream at the same time.
